word:
I have a message that the Lord has given me for His people: Let every family solemnly seek the Lord. Let every family consider Psalm 100. Let fathers and mothers awaken to a sense of their individual responsibility. "Make a joyful noise unto the Lord, all ye lands. . . . Enter into His gates with thanksgiving, and into His courts with praise: be thankful unto Him, and bless 


                                  -215 

His name. For the Lord is good; His mercy is everlasting; and His truth endureth to all generations."
